general.byline: Design Engineer in San Antonio, Texas, he/him
general.about: Design engineer skilled in accessible web experiences. Looking for opportunities to create new brands.

projects.heading: Designer at Hack Club
projects.description: Designed the annual report for Hack Club's most fiscally active year.
projects.title: Designer

projects.heading: Brand Designer at MA Hacks
projects.description: Designed a new brand for the sixth iteration of a high school hackathon in Boston, Massachusetts.
projects.title: Brand Designer

projects.heading: Designer, Developer at Doug Powell Law
projects.description: Created a website for a local bankruptcy attorney's office.
projects.title: Designer, Developer

projects.heading: Designer at Project Boom
projects.description: Designed a new brand and a new website using Figma for a non-profit that recycles old computers that would have become e-waste, repairs them, and then sends them to people who need them all around the world.
projects.title: Designer

projects.heading: Designer, Developer at Fiveable
projects.description: Designed and developed a website for an EdTech's Open Source Initiative using Next.js, Tailwind, and Figma. In collaboration with Ella Xu, Zaid Arshad (Nico), and Aaron Levin.
projects.title: Designer, Developer

projects.heading: Designer at Datacom Design
projects.description: Designed a corporate website for the leading audio-visual architecture firm in South Texas. The design was then passed onto the engineering team after approval.
projects.title: Designer

sideProjects.heading: Cider at Hack Club
sideProjects.description: Created a small website to release a new grant program at Hack Club. Used Next.js and Tailwind.
sideProjects.title: Cider

sideProjects.heading: Brand, Website at Committee to Elect Kunal Botla
sideProjects.description: Creating a brand kit and a website for a promising political candidate. Used Next.js and Tailwind.
sideProjects.title: Brand, Website

sideProjects.heading: Brand, Website for Blossom at Hack Club
sideProjects.title: Brand, Website for Blossom

sideProjects.heading: Sprig Drops at Hack Club
sideProjects.description: Created a small website to release winter-themed cases for a game console. Used Next.js, Tailwind, and ThreeJS.
sideProjects.title: Sprig Drops

sideProjects.heading: Hoodie for Horizon at Hack Club
sideProjects.description: Designed a hoodie for a new coding program's flagship event. Used Figma.
sideProjects.title: Hoodie for Horizon

sideProjects.heading: T-Shirt Design at Brandeis EcoBroncos
sideProjects.description: Designed a new t-shirt for a thriving high school recycling club. Used Figma.
sideProjects.title: T-Shirt Design

sideProjects.heading: Personal Website at Claire Wang
sideProjects.description: Created a website for an emerging biology researcher. Used Next.js, Tailwind, and next-themes.
sideProjects.title: Personal Website

sideProjects.heading: Hyper at Alamo City Hacks
sideProjects.description: Created a website for a new type of competition. Used Next.js, Tailwind, and Framer Motion.
sideProjects.title: Hyper

sideProjects.heading: Personal Website at Woody Keppel
sideProjects.description: Designed a website for a international show performer. Used Figma. Co-made with Belle See who developed the site using Next.js
sideProjects.title: Personal Website

sideProjects.heading: Birthday Website at Charlie Welsh
sideProjects.description: Created a website for a talented iOS engineer's birthday. Used Next.js, Tailwind, and Airtable.
sideProjects.title: Birthday Website

exhibitions.heading: AutoAuto Station at Youth Code Jam
exhibitions.description: Designed and created activities for the AutoAuto station and taught kids Python and Machine Learning with RC cars. Lead a group of 5 volunteers from a data science bootcamp (CodeUp) to help me engage kids that visited our station.
exhibitions.title: AutoAuto Station

talks.heading: An Intro to Figma at Assemble
talks.description: In this workshop, we designed a personal website with Figma. This was intended for beginners and everybody created a design that taught important tools like the shape tool, position tools, and flex-box utilities.
talks.title: An Intro to Figma

talks.heading: Making a Personal Website with Next.js at Assemble
talks.description: In this workshop, we created a personal website with Next.js and Tailwind. This workshop was intended for coders who knew basic HTML and wanted to learn Next.js, but a lot of attendees were beginners so this lasted ~2hrs because we had to start with the basics. Two hackathon teams remixed this workshop to make their project. Co-taught with Jaden Yu.
talks.title: Making a Personal Website with Next.js

talks.heading: Creating Responsive Websites using Tailwind at AngelHacks
talks.description: Doing workshops remotely on Zoom is extremely difficult. There was no final project in this workshop and instead was targeted at teaching CSS Flexbox and Grid to attendees who were learning web design and wanted to integrate these technologies into their site. Although a lot of (virtual) bottlenecks, attendees learned how to make a responsive website using Tailwind CSS.
talks.title: Creating Responsive Websites using Tailwind

talks.heading: Git: Multiplayer Notepad at Youth Code Jam Hackathon
talks.description: I talked about how git works and how beginners can use it. This was for kids in middle school and they finished the workshop with a git repository with pushed code. Linked are the slides made on MDX.
talks.title: Git: Multiplayer Notepad

workExperience.heading: Instructor at Youth Code Jam
workExperience.description: Worked with under-represented and under-privileged K-12 students as well as teachers and taught them how to code in Scratch, Python, and Java. View some of my projects below.
workExperience.title: Instructor

workExperience.heading: Web Engineer II at Hack Club Bank
workExperience.description:
* Designing documents and flyers for the partnerships branch of our fiscal sponsorship program using Figma

* Collaborated on a new internal tool to help transfer money externally
workExperience.title: Web Engineer II

workExperience.heading: Web Engineer at Hack Club Bank
workExperience.description:
* Mentored junior developers in a Ruby on Rails codebase as part of the new MentorShip program

* Built administrative features that directly impacted end users

* Spearheaded fixing older admin features to enable a more efficient application flow for staff members

* Created documents and layouts for a new adult-facing branch of our fiscal sponsorship program using Figma
workExperience.title: Web Engineer

workExperience.heading: Educational Engineer at Hack Club
workExperience.description:
* Designed websites and documents for the philanthropy and communications team for use in fundraising and sending to donors
* Completed a new Clubs team initiative to bring more workshops onto the site
* Converted older, dated workshops into jams and updated examples, live projects, and other assets
workExperience.title: Educational Engineer

workExperience.heading: Web Developer at Mintere
workExperience.description: Led development and design of client websites using Next.js, styled-jsx, and Sanity CMS. Collaborated with the social team to create a unified brand kit for clients.
workExperience.title: Web Developer
